summary: A collection of miscellaneous helper utilities for the MONAI Auto3Dseg framework, covering command‑line construction for distributed training, execution wrappers, algorithm object serialization, optional argument handling, simple data concatenation, metadata extraction for foreground images and labels, conversion of argument lists for fire interfaces, and basic report format verification.
business_intent: To streamline and automate the setup, execution, and post‑processing steps of 3D medical image segmentation pipelines, enabling reproducible training runs and easier handling of configuration, data, and results within the MONAI ecosystem.
